title: "Healthcare industry ‘fifth largest’ contributor to world pollution"
excerpt: "The healthcare industry is the fifth largest contributor to planetary pollution, and adapting digital health technologies like telehealth, electronic health records, usage of artificial intelligence (AI) and the internet of things would help to reduce carbon emissions in the sector."
